trans-unit.source: Represents an individual cell in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示的单个单元格中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCell class represents an individual cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 该单元格类表示的单个单元格中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>的一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>集合</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A>的单元格

trans-unit.source: The row and column for a DataGridViewCell identify the cell's location in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 行和列 DataGridViewCell 标识<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>中的单元格的位置

trans-unit.source: A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained.
trans-unit.target: 典型的单元格包含特定于的行和列包含它的数据。

trans-unit.source: The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 在通过多种方式中，通过设置其属性和处理与它关联的事件可以自定义单元格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>分配给<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制从此方法返回的实例，重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>当前分配到该控件，创建一个新实例。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`与安装程序集[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 库在的"Active Accessibility"部分[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> assigned to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>分配给<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Modifies the input cell border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 修改根据指定的条件的输入引用单元格边框样式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the AdjustCellBorderStyle method to determine the appearance of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件内部调用 AdjustCellBorderStyle 方法来确定的单元格边框外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件通常使用的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>属性`dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput`参数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName> value is not supported as an input style for cells.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>值不支持作为输入的单元格样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the cell border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> ，表示要修改的单元格边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that is used to store intermediate changes to the cell border style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> ，用于存储中间更改的单元格边框样式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要向单元格添加竖框线否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要向单元格添加横框线否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果宿主单元格位于第一个可见列;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosting cell is in the first visible row; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果宿主单元格位于第一个可见行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The modified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已修改<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它表示所有单元格边距的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The default width of the cell border is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 单元格边框的默认宽度为一个像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values to modify the width of the border: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value denotes a width of 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值可修改边框的宽度:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值表示 0 像素的宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values increase the default width by 1 pixel.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值增加 1 个像素的默认宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property is set for the cell's owning row, the rectangle's height is increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>属性设置为该单元格的所属行，矩形的高度将增加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property is set for the cell's owning column, the rectangle's width will be increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>为单元格的所属列设置属性、 矩形的宽度将增加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that the margins are to be calculated for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>的边距来计算。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它表示所有单元格边距的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 指示在单击单元格时，是否对单元格的行取消共享。

trans-unit.source: The ClickUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ClickUnsharesRow 方法调用之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: 它必须返回`true`如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>起的单元格的行取消共享状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它应返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref>包含的数据传递给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick*>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将为行取消共享，否则， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: 创建此单元格的精确副本。

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 重写克隆方法，只要派生自的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>类并添加新属性为派生的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，表示克隆<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index for this cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取此单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The column index for the row that contains the row headers has a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: 包含行标题的行的列索引的值为-1。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that contains the cell; -1 if the cell is not contained within a column.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格; 列的索引如果在列不包含该单元格，则为-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area.
trans-unit.target: 获取环绕单元格的内容区域的边框。

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回的矩形报告客户端坐标，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>方法以获取其值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 基<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>类型，此值是<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: To get the bounding rectangle of the cell rather than the cell contents, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取该单元格而不是单元格内容的边界矩形，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>用于限定单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行是一个共享的行。

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -或者-该单元格列标题单元格。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> property is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>属性小于 0，表示单元格为行标题单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.target: 指示在单击单元格的内容时，是否对单元格的行取消共享。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与该单元格关联的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示在用户右键单击该单元格时通常会显示的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`，获取 ContextMenuStrip 属性引发的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>的控件的事件，并返回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性作为指定在事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ContextMenuStrip property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为事件没有处理程序，获取 ContextMenuStrip 属性的值返回以前指定的值或它的默认值`null`。

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell ContextMenuStrip value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>使用大量的数据，若要设置单元格 ContextMenuStrip 多个单元格的值时避免性能损失时，事件是非常有用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Dispose 后，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>占用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用释放在发布到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>最后一个引用之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> object's `Finalize` method.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is always <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 基<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>类型，此值始终是<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text describing an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置描述与该单元格关联的错误条件的文本。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ErrorText property is used when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，ErrorText 属性来处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating>时

trans-unit.source: If the cell's value fails some validation criteria, set the ErrorText property and cancel the commit operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格的值失败某些验证条件，将设置 ErrorText 属性并通过设置取消提交操作<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs>到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text you specify is then displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and the user is prompted to fix the error in the cell's data.
trans-unit.target: 然后显示你指定的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，并且提示用户以在单元格的数据中修复的错误。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is `true`, you can provide error text for rows and cells using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> events.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>是`true`，你可以提供错误文本的行和单元格使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different ErrorText string to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当将不同的 ErrorText 字符串分配给一个单元格，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>引发控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged>

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, resizing of the error icon is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 4.5.2 开始，错误图标的调整大小取决于系统 DPI 设置时 app.config 文件包含以下条目︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: The text that describes an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 描述与该单元格关联的错误条件的文本。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 释放非托管的资源并执行其他清理操作之前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>通过垃圾回收回收。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method with `false` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>方法替换`false`作为参数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell as formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: 获取为显示进行格式化的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the FormattedValue is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>属性是由单元格，包含的实际数据对象，而 FormattedValue 是此对象的格式的表示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>属性分别对应于这些值的数据类型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method to convert the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性的值调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>方法将单元格的值转换为等效的显示值的类型由指示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: 这就提高了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>事件，你可以处理自定义值的转换。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式设置不成功，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为此事件或处理程序集的处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`true`，将引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the cell or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the cell does not belong to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的格式化的值或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果单元格不属于<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取与该单元格关联的格式化值的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>属性是由单元格，包含的实际数据对象，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>属性是格式化的数据表示形式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the type of the cell's formatted value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>表示类型的单元格格式化值。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已被冻结该单元格。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Frozen property depends on the state of the cell's parent row and column.
trans-unit.target: 冻结属性的值取决于该单元格的父行和列的状态。

trans-unit.source: If the `Frozen` property of either the row or column is set to `true`, the cell's Frozen property will also be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Frozen`的行或列的属性设置为`true`，该单元格的已冻结属性也将`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该单元格处于冻结状态;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 检索要将复制到的单元格格式化的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve a Clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来检索表示单元格的值的剪贴板格式的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cell value is first retrieved in its display format from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的值第一次检索中的显示格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetEditedFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName> event to format the value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> event if formatting is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会引起<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>事件来设置值的格式和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName>格式化失败时的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的位置相关参数指示此单元格表示定义中的所选单元格的区域的数据的表中的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, additional formatting information may be returned by this method along with the display-formatted cell value.
trans-unit.target: 根据单元格的位置中，此方法的显示格式的单元值以及可能返回附加格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，某一行的第一列中的单元格的 HTML 格式将包括标记，该值指示行的开头。

trans-unit.source: The supported Clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 支持的剪贴板格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control used to edit the cell.
trans-unit.target: 初始化用来编辑单元格的控件。

trans-unit.source: As an optimization technique, typically all the cells of the same type and in the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> share a single hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: 作为一优化技术，通常的所有单元格的相同类型和相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>共享单个托管编辑控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, before the control is used by a cell, it needs to be initialized by the InitializeEditingControl method.
trans-unit.target: 但是，由的单元格使用该控件之前，它需要由 InitializeEditingControl 方法进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: The first time it is called, this method adds the control to the list of editing controls in its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 第一次调用时，则此方法会将控件添加到其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>中的编辑控件的列表

trans-unit.source: It also initializes some of the visual properties of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它还会初始化某些单元格的视觉属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, InitializeEditingControl sets the background color of the editing area to match the supplied cell style parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，InitializeEditingControl 设置要与提供的单元格样式参数匹配的编辑区域的背景色。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to InitializeEditingControl do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 对 InitializeEditingControl 的后续调用不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes use this method to host an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class corresponding to their type.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类使用此方法来托管的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>与其类型相对应的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, a table that contains one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> objects calls this method to add a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> editing control to the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，包含一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>对象调用此方法可添加一个单个的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>编辑控件到所属<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>的表

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此单元格当前是否正在编辑。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when you are working directly with cell instances.
trans-unit.target: 当直接处理单元格实例，此属性很有用。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName> event to determine when the user enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName>事件，以确定用户在进入编辑模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBeginEdit?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行是一个共享的行。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row is unshared if the user presses a key while the focus is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否用户按下某个键，当焦点位于单元格上时，父行是否取消共享。

trans-unit.source: The KeyDownUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: KeyDownUnsharesRow 方法调用之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 它必须返回`true`如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>自变量的效果的取消共享已包含该单元格的行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它应返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将为行取消共享，否则， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The KeyPressUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: KeyPressUnsharesRow 方法调用之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, it must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中，它必须返回`true`如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>起的取消共享已包含该单元格的行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse pointer leaves the row.

trans-unit.source: The MouseLeaveUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseLeave%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, it must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseLeave%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中，它必须返回`true`如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>起的取消共享已包含该单元格的行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它应返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When the user edits a cell value and commits the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to convert the displayed value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当用户编辑单元格值并提交更改，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将调用此方法将转换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>从显示的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The control then sets the underlying cell value or data source value to the converted value.
trans-unit.target: 控件然后将设置为转换后的值的基础单元格的值或数据源值。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method parses the `formattedValue` parameter using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style indicated by the `cellStyle` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认实现分析`formattedValue`参数使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>的单元格样式属性由`cellStyle`参数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> property or `null` if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> is <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> and the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> is a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formattedValue`等同于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，此方法返回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>属性或`null`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>是<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>和的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>是引用类型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `formattedValue` is not equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, this method parses `formattedValue` using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property and the specified or default converters.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formattedValue`是否不等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>，此方法分析`formattedValue`使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>属性和指定或默认的转换器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>是可以为 null，此方法会包装形式的返回值<xref:System.Nullable%601>类型。</xref:System.Nullable%601> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the editing control may take up more space than a single cell, it may need to be positioned differently when editing a cell in the first visible column or first visible row so it does not paint outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in pixels, of a rectangular area into which the cell can fit.
trans-unit.target: 获取以像素为单位，可以容纳单元格的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The PreferredSize property returns the natural size of the cell computed by the cell's owning row and column.
trans-unit.target: PreferredSize 属性返回由该单元格的所属行和列计算的单元格的自然大小。

trans-unit.source: PreferredSize returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a width and height of -1 if the cell is not contained in a table.
trans-unit.target: PreferredSize 返回<xref:System.Drawing.Size>，其宽度和高度的表中不包含该单元格时为-1。</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: If the cell is in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> property set to `false`, -1 is returned for the width.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>具有其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A>属性设置为`false`，用作宽度，则返回-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Resizable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: This method relies on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法依赖于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> containing the height and width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>包含高度和宽度，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>小于 0，表示单元格为行标题单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行是一个共享的行。

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -或者-该单元格列标题单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell's data can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以编辑单元格的数据。

trans-unit.source: The ReadOnly property indicates whether the data displayed by the cell can be edited.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly 属性指示是否可以编辑单元格所显示的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can set ReadOnly for individual cells, or you can make an entire row or column of cells read-only by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以为各个单元格设置 ReadOnly 或你可以为整个行或单元格的列只读通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, if a cell's parent row or column is set to read-only, the child cells will adopt the same value.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果单元格的父行或列设置为只读的则子单元格将采用相同的值。

trans-unit.source: You can override this default behavior by setting ReadOnly for individual cells.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过为各个单元格设置 ReadOnly 重写此默认行为。

trans-unit.source: You can navigate to a read-only cell, and you can set a read-only cell to be the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以导航到只读的单元格，并且您可以设置只读的单元格以将当前单元格。

trans-unit.source: ReadOnly only affects whether a cell is editable; it does not affect whether the user can delete rows.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly 仅影响单元格是否可编辑;它不会影响是否用户可以删除行。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell's data cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果不能编辑单元格的数据;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no owning row when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时无所属行。

trans-unit.source: -or- The owning row is shared when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-当设置此属性时共享所属的行。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调整单元格的大小。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Resizable property is set by the cell's parent row or column.
trans-unit.target: 可调整大小属性的值将由该单元格的父行或列。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell can be resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以调整单元格的大小;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 获取单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: When the RowIndex property returns -1, the cell is either a column header, or the cell's row is shared.
trans-unit.target: 当 RowIndex 属性返回-1 时，该单元格任一列标题，或共享单元格的行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that contains the cell; -1 if there is no owning row.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格; 行的索引如果无所属行，则为-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell has been selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已选择的单元。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell has been selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果单元格有已选择;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: There is no associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何关联<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>设置此属性时。

trans-unit.source: -or- The owning row is shared when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-当设置此属性时共享所属的行。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: The cell value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的单元格值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value has been set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未设置值;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the parent .
trans-unit.target: rowIndex小于 0 或大于或等于父代中的行数 。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>小于 0。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取单元格的大小。

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, the Size property returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a width and height of -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果该单元格不与关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制，该大小属性返回<xref:System.Drawing.Size>，其宽度和高度为-1。</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> set to the owning row's height and the owning column's width.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>设置为所属行的高度和所属列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行是一个共享的行。

trans-unit.source: -or- The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: -或者-该单元格列标题单元格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格的样式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property, which inherits styles from other properties of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件将显示其使用指示的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>属性，它继承类型<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>的其他属性中的样式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>的样式的单元格</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The styles specified through the Style property override the styles specified through all other cell-style properties, but do not necessarily indicate all the styles that contribute to the cell's appearance.
trans-unit.target: 通过样式属性指定的样式重写所有其他单元格样式属性，可以通过指定的样式，但不是一定表示单元格的外观做出贡献的所有样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The style associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 与该单元格关联的样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains supplemental data about the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含有关单元格的补充数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the <xref:System.Object> class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: 从派生的任何类型<xref:System.Object>类可以分配给此属性。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The Tag property is commonly used to store data that is closely associated with the value displayed by the cell.
trans-unit.target: Tag 属性通常用于存储与单元格所显示的值紧密相关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含有关单元格的数据。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text associated with this cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此单元格关联的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is displayed as the cell ToolTip when the mouse pointer is over the cell and the property value is not <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针位于单元格和属性值不是，此属性的值显示为工具提示的单元格<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is <xref:System.String>, the cell will display a ToolTip containing the value of the cell if the value is truncated in the cell display; otherwise, the cell will not display a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是<xref:System.String>，该单元格将显示工具提示包含单元格的值，如果值为截断在单元格显示; 否则为该单元格将不会显示工具提示。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: You can also prevent the display of a ToolTip by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过设置阻止的工具提示显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the ToolTipText property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`，获取 ToolTipText 属性引发的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>的控件的事件，并返回的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性作为指定在事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the ToolTipText property returns the previously specified value or its default value of <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为事件没有处理程序，获取 ToolTipText 属性的值返回以前指定的值或<xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>其默认值

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell ToolTipText value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>使用大量的数据，若要设置单元格 ToolTipText 多个单元格的值时避免性能损失时，事件是非常有用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 更改此属性引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged>上拥有事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>，如果存在。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 与该单元格关联的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that describes the current object.
trans-unit.target: 返回描述当前对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise noted, the ToString method for all the various cell types will return a string of the form shown in the following code example: `Classname {RowIndex = #, ColumnIndex = #}`
trans-unit.target: 除非另行说明，所有单元格类型的 ToString 方法将返回字符串的窗体中下面的代码示例所示︰`Classname {RowIndex = #, ColumnIndex = #}`

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with this cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此单元格关联的值。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different value to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当将不同的值分配给一个单元格，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>引发控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: The Value property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: Value 属性是由单元格，包含的实际数据对象，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>属性是格式化的数据表示形式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>属性分别对应于这些值的数据类型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the Value property, the specified value is not automatically converted from a formatted, display value to an underlying cell value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置 Value 属性时，不会自动转换指定的值从一个格式化显示的值为基础的单元格值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> in effect for the cell is ignored, so setting Value to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> does not result in a property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>有效的单元格被忽略，因此将值设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>不会导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data to be displayed by the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格所显示的数据。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex*> is outside the valid range of 0 to the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex*>超出了 0 到减 1 控件中的行数的有效范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>小于 0，表示单元格为行标题单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格中值的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: If the ValueType property for the cell has not been set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the owning column is used, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未设置单元格的 ValueType 属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>使用所属列的属性，如果它存在。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.ValueType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>属性是由单元格，包含的实际数据对象，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>属性是格式化的数据表示形式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ValueType and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: ValueType 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>属性分别对应于这些值的数据类型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the data type of the value in the cell.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>表示单元格中的值的数据类型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is in a row or column that has been hidden.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示该单元格是否中的行或列已被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether the cell is in a row or a column with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示该单元格位于具有的列或行其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: It does not indicate whether the cell has been scrolled off-screen.
trans-unit.target: 它不指示该单元格是否已被滚动到屏幕之外。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a cell is visible within the display area of the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Displayed%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否在控件的显示区域内可见的单元格，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Displayed%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Displayed%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该单元格是否可见，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
